tool.name: SAGA.shapes_polygons.12
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayPOLYGONS False isArrayID False output_data_INTERSECT $output_data_INTERSECT name SAGA.shapes_polygons.12 POLYGONS $POLYGONS ID $ID prefer $prefer response $response outputType_INTERSECT $OutputSection_INTERSECT.outputType_INTERSECT transmissionMode_INTERSECT $OutputSection_INTERSECT.transmissionMode_INTERSECT

param.name: POLYGONS
param.label: Polygons
param.help: Polygons The following data types are allowed in the txt file: json, vnd.google-earth.kml+xml, xml

param.name: ID
param.label: Identifier
param.help: Identifier The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_INTERSECT
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_INTERSECT
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: Self-intersection of one layer's polygons.<br/>Uses the free and open source software library <b>Clipper</b> created by Angus Johnson.<br/><a target="_blank" href="http://www.angusj.com/delphi/clipper.php">Clipper Homepage</a><br/><a target="_blank" href="http://sourceforge.net/projects/polyclipping/">Clipper at SourceForge</a><br/>
